Developer Guide

Installation

ROS Installation

  1. Follow the ROS Noetic installation guide found at ROS Installation Guide

Unreal Engine Installation

SDK Installation

  1. Install the SDK

$ pip install DTSDK

  1. Import the SDK

from DTSDK import DTSDK

  1. hello test test test
